name: Casio F-91W-1DG
short_description: Classic Digital Watch with Resin Band

specs.features: Daily Alarm, Hourly Time Signal, Stopwatch, Auto Calendar, LED Light, 12/24-hour format

description_paragraphs: Iconic digital watch from Casio combining simplicity, reliability, and lightweight comfort.
Perfect for everyday use, with practical functions like alarm, stopwatch, and long-lasting battery.

name: Casio AE-1000W-3AVDF
short_description: Multi-band World Time Digital Watch with Resin Band

specs.features: World Time (48 cities), 1/100-second Stopwatch, 5 Alarms, Countdown Timer, Full Auto Calendar, LED Light, 12/24-hour format

description_paragraphs: Rugged and functional digital watch from Casio with World Time feature, perfect for travelers and sports enthusiasts.
Resin band and water resistance make it suitable for everyday adventures, while long battery life ensures reliability.

name: Casio GA-2100-1ADR
short_description: Analog-digital Carbon Core Guard G-Shock watch with resin band

specs.features: Shock resistant; Mineral glass; Double LED light; World time (31 time zones, 48 cities + UTC); 1/100-second stopwatch; Countdown timer; 5 daily alarms; Hourly time signal; Full auto-calendar; 12/24-hour format; Hand-shift feature

description_paragraphs: The Casio GA-2100-1ADR is a tough and versatile G-Shock watch featuring a Carbon Core Guard structure and 200 m water resistance, designed for rugged use and everyday wear.
Its analog-digital display, world time, stopwatch, countdown timer and long battery life make the GA-2100-1ADR an ideal choice for sports, travel and daily lifestyle use.

name: Casio A159W-N1DF
short_description: Unisex vintage stainless steel digital bracelet watch

specs.features: Daily alarm, Hourly time signal, 1/100-second stopwatch, Auto-calendar, LED light, 12/24-hour format

description_paragraphs: The Casio A159W-N1DF is a classic vintage digital watch that blends retro styling with reliable everyday functionality. Its compact rectangular case and clear digital display make it instantly recognizable and timeless.

The stainless steel bracelet and splash-resistant construction make it suitable for daily wear. With practical features such as an alarm, stopwatch, auto-calendar and long battery life, this watch delivers simplicity, durability and iconic Casio design.

name: Casio AE-1200WH-1AVDF
short_description: World Time Digital Watch with Resin Band

specs.features: World Time (48 cities), 1/100-second Stopwatch, 5 Alarms, Countdown Timer, Full Auto Calendar, LED Light, 12/24-hour format

description_paragraphs: Reliable and multifunctional digital watch with World Time for frequent travelers.
Resin case and band make it lightweight and durable, while 10-year battery ensures long-lasting use.
